name: Castle Break
description: Arkanoid with shooting and building meets various enemies in a grand battle versus evil castles with evil eyes
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: existing Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: existing Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: working Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: working with 1920x1080 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: working
